title: Cashew and Coconut Prawn Curry
ingredients: ['1kg (2 1/4 lb) peeled and deveined medium prawns', '1/4 teaspoon turmeric', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '3 tablespoons cashews', '5 whole cardamom pods, broken', '2 cinnamon sticks', '1 teaspoon whole black peppercorns', '2 dessertspoons sunflower oil', '1/2 red onion, diced', '1/2 teaspoon garlic paste', '3/4 teaspoon ginger paste', 'salt to taste', '1/2 teaspoon garam masala', '1 large bay leaf', '1 large tomato, diced', '2 green peppers, seeded and diced', '1 (400ml) tin coconut milk']
